## TrackingKeyCondition type

Represents a condition on the value of a Tracking Key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TrackingKeyCondition = {
    Keyword?: Link;
    Negate?: boolean;
    Operator?: NumericalConditionOperator;
    Value?: number;
};
```
